channel.title: How to I do I get a new server ip rather than 0.0.0.0
channel.description:
Sup,
I have the i.p. of 0.0.0.0 for my server I wan't it to be 'WreckenScape.no-ip.biz' please reply back telling me how to user No-ip.com, =]!

item.title: How to I do I get a new server ip rather than 0.0.0.0
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

actually you can. like do you want an ip like theweirdgamer.no-ip.biz? if you do just go to no-ip.com and register and make a host and dl the client and then you can use that ip for your server but the face has to be blushing for it to work

Read full topic
item.source: How to I do I get a new server ip rather than 0.0.0.0

item.title: How to I do I get a new server ip rather than 0.0.0.0
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

You cant. If you are the owner you must stick with 0.0.0.0 unless your on another computer with a different ip.

Read full topic
